cmc.ui

Class UserUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmc.ui.UserUI

  • public class UserUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserUI class controls user's action.
    Version:
    April 3, 2016
    Author:
    Duong Do, Matthew Kounniyom, Alex Seefeldt

    • Method Detail

      • searchForSchools

        public School[] searchForSchools(java.lang.String[] searchValues,
                                 java.lang.String[] emphases)
        Takes two String arrays: one containing all search values for this search (besides emphases) and the other containing the emphasis search values. If any search value is the empty string or null, the search will ignore that attribute. Returns an array of up to 50 Schools best matching the search terms.
        Parameters:
        searchValues - the values being searched for
        emphases - the emphasis values being searched for
        Returns:
        an array of matching Schools

      • manageSchools

        public School[] manageSchools()
        Access method for .jsp pages when managing a user's list of saved schools.
        Returns:
        an array of this user's saved Schools

      • saveSchool

        public void saveSchool(School school)
        Access method for .jsp pages to PersonHome.saveSchool(Person, School)
        Parameters:
        school - the School to be saved

      • removeSchool

        public void removeSchool(School school)
        Access method for .jsp pages to PersonHome.removeSchool(Person, School)
        Parameters:
        school - the School to be removed

      • editUser

        public void editUser(java.lang.String firstName,
                     java.lang.String lastName,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Limited access method for .jsp pages to PersonHome.updatePerson(String, String, String, String, char, char)
        Parameters:
        firstName - the firstname to be changed to
        lastName - the lastname to be changed to
        password - the password to change to

      • getRecommendations

        public School[] getRecommendations(School school)
        Returns an array of 5 Schools closely matching the given school. Used for displaying the expanded view of a school.
        Parameters:
        school - the School for which these recommendations are generated
        Returns:
        an School array of length 5 containing the recommended Schools
